name: Spring boot 101
tagline: Simple web application written using Spring Framework and run on top of Spring Boot
body:
### Overview
This tutorial will teach you the basics of how to write and a web application using Spring Boot.

### Audience
This is based on what motivated me from learning Spring application development. 
* Java developers, who know how to use gradle.
* People who have a good understanding of how web applications work.
* People who looking for way to get a java based web application up and running in no time

### Definitions
* Spring
* Spring Boot

### Project Description
Food spending management Application that allows users to record breakfast, Lunch, and Dinner expenses.

### Required tools

### Application Structure

### Coding

Below, we are going to describe every step taken to complete the project (from scratch)


### Testing

### Future work
* Running Spring Boot Application inside a docker container.
